languages.text:
{n}Стройная фигура Арлекина выныривает из мерцающей дымки. Грациозно, словно исполняя печальный танец, он подходит к умирающему эльдару неподалеку.{/n}
"Скорблю, что замер танец твой навек —
Погаснут очи зрящего пути.
Пытливо я взираю в них, ищу
Тот отблеск, что укажет путь к твоим
Собратьям, заключенным в клетку бури".

traits.locale_text:
{n}Стройная фигура Арлекина выныривает из мерцающей дымки. Грациозно, словно исполняя печальный танец, он подходит к умирающему эльдару неподалеку.{/n}
"Скорблю, что замер танец твой навек —
Погаснут очи зрящего пути.
Пытливо я взираю в них, ищу
Тот отблеск, что укажет путь к твоим
Собратьям, заключенным в клетку бури".
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}The slender figure of the Harlequin emerges from the shimmering haze. With the grace of one performing a sorrowful dance, he approaches the dying Aeldari nearby.{/n}
"Your dance is now tableau, and I lament,
The darkness in the eyes that saw the Path,
I peer into those tunnels black and bleak,
A gleam I seek, the one that points the way
To your imprisoned kin in tempest's cage."
languages.original_text:
{n}Стройная фигура Арлекина выныривает из мерцающей дымки. Грациозно, словно исполняя печальный танец, он подходит к умирающему эльдару неподалеку.{/n}

languages.text:
{n}丑角的纤细身影从散发着微光的雾气中出现。他以表演悲伤舞蹈的优雅姿态，走近身边奄奄一息的艾达灵族。{/n}
“你的舞蹈栩栩如生，而我却在哀叹。
那些人看到了道途，眼中满是黑暗。
我窥视着那些阴沉黯淡的道途。
我在寻找光芒，它将为我指路。
前往暴风囚笼，找到你的亲族。”
languages.original_text:
{n}The slender figure of the Harlequin emerges from the shimmering haze. With the grace of one performing a sorrowful dance, he approaches the dying Aeldari nearby.{/n}
"Your dance is now tableau, and I lament,
The darkness in the eyes that saw the Path,
I peer into those tunnels black and bleak,
A gleam I seek, the one that points the way
To your imprisoned kin in tempest's cage."

前往暴风囚笼，找到你的亲族。”
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}La figura esbelta del Arlequín surge de la neblina reluciente. Con la gracia de un experto interpretando un baile fúnebre se acerca al cercano Aeldari moribundo.{/n}
«Tu baile es ahora un cuadro, y lamento
la oscuridad de los ojos que vieron la Senda.
Escudriño esos túneles sombríos y negros
en busca de un resplandor que indique la vereda
hacia tus hermanos encerrados en la tormenta».
languages.original_text:
{n}The slender figure of the Harlequin emerges from the shimmering haze. With the grace of one performing a sorrowful dance, he approaches the dying Aeldari nearby.{/n}
"Your dance is now tableau, and I lament,
The darkness in the eyes that saw the Path,
I peer into those tunnels black and bleak,
A gleam I seek, the one that points the way
To your imprisoned kin in tempest's cage."

languages.text:
{n}ハーレクィンの細身の姿が陽炎のように揺らめく霞の中から現れた。悲哀の踊りを披露するような優雅さで、近くにいた瀕死のアエルダリに近いた。{/n}
「嘆かわしきかな、君の舞は絵画となった
道を見たその瞳の闇
黒く荒涼とした迷路の奥、僕は覗き込む
行先を示す光を探し求め
嵐の檻に幽閉されし仲間のもとへ」
languages.original_text:
{n}The slender figure of the Harlequin emerges from the shimmering haze. With the grace of one performing a sorrowful dance, he approaches the dying Aeldari nearby.{/n}
"Your dance is now tableau, and I lament,
The darkness in the eyes that saw the Path,
I peer into those tunnels black and bleak,
A gleam I seek, the one that points the way
To your imprisoned kin in tempest's cage."

languages.text:
{n}Die schlanke Gestalt des Harlekins taucht aus dem schimmernden Dunst auf. Mit der Anmut eines Tänzers, der einen tieftraurigen Tanz aufführt, nähert er sich dem sterbenden Aeldari in der Nähe.{/n}
"Tableau ist Euer Tanz nun, und Düsternis
liegt in den Augen, die den Pfad geseh'n.
In diese Tunnel schwarz und trist ich blick,
such ein Schimmern, das den richt'gen Weg weist
zu Eurem Blute im Käfig des Sturms."
languages.original_text:
{n}The slender figure of the Harlequin emerges from the shimmering haze. With the grace of one performing a sorrowful dance, he approaches the dying Aeldari nearby.{/n}
"Your dance is now tableau, and I lament,
The darkness in the eyes that saw the Path,
I peer into those tunnels black and bleak,
A gleam I seek, the one that points the way
To your imprisoned kin in tempest's cage."

languages.text:
{n}La silhouette élancée de l'Arlequin émerge de la brume scintillante. Avec la grâce d'un danseur de ballet jouant une scène tragique, il s'approche de l'Aeldari à l'agonie.{/n}
« Votre danse n'est plus qu'un tableau, et je regrette
Les ténèbres dans les yeux qui ont vu la Voie.
Je plonge le regard dans ces tunnels mornes en quête
D'une lueur miraculeuse qui guiderait mes pas
Jusqu'à vos semblables dans leur cage de tempête. »
languages.original_text:
{n}The slender figure of the Harlequin emerges from the shimmering haze. With the grace of one performing a sorrowful dance, he approaches the dying Aeldari nearby.{/n}
"Your dance is now tableau, and I lament,
The darkness in the eyes that saw the Path,
I peer into those tunnels black and bleak,
A gleam I seek, the one that points the way
To your imprisoned kin in tempest's cage."

traits.locale_text:
{n}La silhouette élancée de l'arlequin émerge de la brume scintillante. Avec la grâce d'un danseur de ballet jouant une scène tragique, il s'approche de l'Aeldari à l'agonie.{/n}
« Votre danse n'est plus qu'un tableau, et je regrette

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}Parıltılı sisin içinden Arleken'in ince silüeti beliriyor. Hüzünle dans ediyormuş gibi bir zarafetle, yakınındaki can çekişen Aeldari'ye yaklaşıyor.{/n}
"Artık perdeler inmişse sahneye,
Ağıtlar düzerim Yolu gören gözlere.
O gözler ki artık soğuk ve kara,
Gitmek gereken yolu göstersin bana,
Varmak için kasırganın kafesindeki soydaşlarına."
languages.original_text:
{n}The slender figure of the Harlequin emerges from the shimmering haze. With the grace of one performing a sorrowful dance, he approaches the dying Aeldari nearby.{/n}
"Your dance is now tableau, and I lament,
The darkness in the eyes that saw the Path,
I peer into those tunnels black and bleak,
A gleam I seek, the one that points the way
To your imprisoned kin in tempest's cage."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Parıltılı sisin içinden, ince silüetli Arleken beliriyor. Hüzünle dans edercesine zarafetle yakında can çekişen Aeldariye yaklaşıyor.{/n}
"Artık perdeler inmişse sahneye,
Ağıtlar düzerim Yol'u gören gözlere.
O gözler ki artık soğuk ve kara,
Gitmek gereken yolu göstersin bana,
Varmak için kasırganın kafesindeki soydaşlarına."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
